# Welcome to my website!
Hello everyone, my name is Zhu Yingying and I am delighted to introduce myself here.
Hello, my name is Zhu Yingying. I'm a history teacher from Harbin, Heilongjiang Province
I have a deep interest and love for history. 
Currently, I'm studying at Belarusian State University, working towards a master's degree.
In life, I'm passionate about traveling.
I like to explore every corner of the world on foot! 
I'm very glad to introduce myself here.
